visual_style_summary: Luxurious Indian royal wedding ambiance with warm golden tones, emphasizing intricate craftsmanship and vibrant emerald details. The overall look is regal, ornate, and richly textured, highlighting traditional Indian craftsmanship in a high-end cinematic style. The lighting is warm and glowing, creating a romantic, timeless atmosphere with subtle sparkle highlights and soft diffusion to enhance textures and materials.

scenes.camera_movement: Slow glide across the detailed diamond motifs
scenes.lighting_setup: Warm, royal lighting with soft diffusion highlighting sparkle and texture

scenes.description: Gentle slow-motion 360° orbital rotation around the necklace to showcase intricate layers, metalwork, and the vibrancy of the emerald stones.
scenes.camera_angle: Orbit around the necklace at a consistent height, top-angle view
scenes.camera_movement: Smooth 360° slow orbit at fixed height
scenes.lighting_setup: Warm ambient lighting with subtle highlights on stones and metal

scenes.description: Final slow-motion pause on the complete set with subtle sparkle highlights, evoking a regal and elegant celebratory mood.
scenes.camera_angle: Static shot with slight zoom or tilt as needed
scenes.lighting_setup: Enhanced sparkle reflection with warm accents to emphasize brilliance

technical_notes: Maintain strict product consistency with accurate geometry, and avoid any distortions or artificial effects. Use high-quality macro lenses (100mm macro, f/2.8) for close-up shots to capture detailed sparkle and texture. Lighting should emulate warm, royal tones with soft diffusion, emphasizing richness and craftsmanship without overexposing the stones. Background remains a clean, luxurious champagne silk to complement the Indian regal aesthetic. Reflections on metals and stones must be physically accurate and natural, avoiding any artificial glow or over-bright highlights.
